head.supplied: Melbourne botan. Garden ¶ 13/4/69 ¶ ¶ It affords me much pleasure, dear Dr Hooker, to introduce to you a young Australian Surgeon, Dr Rees, one of the first, who were educated at the Melbourne Univer...

div.p: RBG Kew, Kew correspondence, Australia, Mueller, 1858-70, f. 378.

It affords me much pleasure, dear Dr Hooker, to introduce to you a young Australian Surgeon, Dr Rees, one of the first, who were educated at the Melbourne University. He proceeds now to Europe to continue still further his studies, and if you can aid him with any advise I shall feel indebted.
Dr Rees brings you a small packet of seeds, select sorts gathered this season.
Perhaps you will kindly afford to the young Gentleman the opportunity of seeing the grand collections at Kew.
